desc.p: A maximum of 10 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the CUSTOMER file.
Fields IS.RELATION to form a related multi value set. Standard T24 numeric field.
A maximum of 3 characters may be entered.
Must be the key to a valid entry on the RELATION file.
Fields IS.RELATION to form a related multi value set. Standard T24 customer field.
